name: PDFAnnotationLine
desc: A PDFAnnotationLine object displays a single line on a page. DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.

items.name: func startPoint() -> NSPoint
items.desc: Returns the starting point for the line.

items.name: func setStart(NSPoint)
items.desc: Sets the starting point for the line.

items.name: func endPoint() -> NSPoint
items.desc: Returns the ending point for the line in page space.

items.name: func setEnd(NSPoint)
items.desc: Sets the ending point for the line.

items.name: func startLineStyle() -> PDFLineStyle
items.desc: Returns the line ending style for the starting point of the line.

items.name: func setStart(PDFLineStyle)
items.desc: Sets the line ending style for the starting point of the line.

items.name: func endLineStyle() -> PDFLineStyle
items.desc: Returns the line ending style for the ending point of the line.

items.name: func setEnd(PDFLineStyle)
items.desc: Sets the line ending style for the ending point of the line.

items.name: func interiorColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Returns the color used to fill the ornament at the ends of the line.

items.name: func setInteriorColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the color used to fill the ornament at the ends of the line.

items.name: enum PDFLineStyle
items.desc: The following constants specify the available line ending styles.
